title: Philip Pearlstein - Drawings and watercolors (Art Ebook).pdf
description:
H.N. Abrams / 1988 / Pdf / English / ISBN10 0810914964 / 210 pages / 25.4 MB

Immediately recognizable to anyone familiar with contemporary art, Philip Pearlstein's larger-than-life nudes pose under a cold light, motionless and abstracted, in slashing diagonal compositions, often veering off the canvas entirely. Pearlstein has long been acknowledged as a master of contemporary realist painting, but he has also created a significant number of drawings and watercolors  which, in their intelligence and virtuosity, are equally valid expressions of his Art
